text: have you ever made dulce de leche takes

I'm using store-bought so it's so easy
the first thing that I'm doing just to
start off is cutting up about ten ounces
of day-old bread into half inch cubes
even the ends that's totally fine I like
the way that it gives a little bit of
extra texture and then you're gonna bake
this in a 2 quart baking dish
I just want to butter it so nothing
sticks and also butter adds so much

fine at room temperature unless it's too

to that add two eggs I have 1 cup of

of a teaspoon of pure vanilla extract
whisk it to combine everything just
needs to get nice and smooth the eggs

you need 1/2 a cup
coarsely chopped sprinkle that over the

45 minutes now all you have to do is
